job_title: Machine Learning Engineer for Ad Campaign Optimization
job_description:
We are a large-scale online advertising business, spending high ad budgets across Facebook, TikTok, and other platforms. 

We want to automate our entire campaign analysis and optimization process using machine learning and data-driven decision-making. The goal is to replace manual media buying decisions with an AI-driven system that continuously monitors performance, adjusts bids, and optimizes scaling and stopping rules.

We are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer with a strong background in data analysis, predictive modeling, and automated decision-making for ad campaigns.

Responsibilities:
	‚Ä¢	Develop machine learning models to analyze campaign performance and detect profitable patterns.
	‚Ä¢	Build predictive models for CPC, CPA, and ROI trends to guide scaling/stopping decisions.
	‚Ä¢	Automate budget allocation and bid adjustments based on real-time performance.
	‚Ä¢	Implement anomaly detection to flag fraud traffic or sudden performance drops.
	‚Ä¢	Work with Facebook, TikTok, PIs to fetch campaign performance data.
	‚Ä¢	Continuously improve campaign automation rules based on new insights.

Requirements:
	‚Ä¢	Strong experience in Machine Learning & Data Science (Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch, Scikit-learn).
	‚Ä¢	Expertise in predictive modeling, time-series forecasting (LSTM, ARIMA, Prophet).
	‚Ä¢	Experience with real-time data analysis (BigQuery, Snowflake, Apache Kafka, Redshift).
	‚Ä¢	Familiarity with media buying and ad campaign metrics (EPC, CPA, CTR, ROI).
	‚Ä¢	Ability to integrate machine learning models with ad platform APIs.
	‚Ä¢	Prior experience in performance marketing, ad tech, or programmatic media buying is a plus.

Bonus Skills:
	‚Ä¢	Experience with Reinforcement Learning (Multi-Armed Bandits, Q-Learning).
	‚Ä¢	Knowledge of automated decision-making for ad optimization.
	‚Ä¢	Familiarity with big data pipelines and cloud computing (AWS, GCP, Azure).

job_title: AI Consultant/Developer for Vehicle Buying Business ‚Äì Exploring AI Integration Possibilities
job_description:
I own a car-buying business that purchases vehicles from the public, and I‚Äôm exploring how AI can improve and automate parts of this process.

I am looking for an AI consultant/developer who can:
-Educate me on AI-powered solutions that could benefit my business.
-Assess my business model and recommend AI applications.
-Suggest third-party AI tools or custom development options.

I am open to ideas, but some possibilities I want to explore include:
-Automated Vehicle Appraisal ‚Äì AI analyzing customer-submitted car details & generating purchase offers.
-Automating our Billing process via AI (we have automation for this, but not sure if AI could make it even better)
-Sales in the sense of following up with customers via Email/SMS (Again, already have automation for this, but curious what AI could offer)
-AI-Powered Pricing Model ‚Äì Using market data to determine competitive offers and/or utilize our internal data
-Computer Vision for Damage Detection ‚Äì AI analyzing vehicle photos for wear, dents, or accidents.
-AI Chatbot Integration ‚Äì Automating customer interactions & answering common questions.
-CRM Automation ‚Äì Streamlining my sales & offer process through AI-driven workflows.

I am looking for someone who can break down these possibilities and recommend the best approach. If it sounds like AI can do the things I want, let's move forward on working together.

job_title: AI-Powered Document Processing and Query System
job_description:
The AI-Powered Document Processing and Query System is designed to enable four user roles‚ÄîAdministrators, Experts (SMEs), General Users (GUs), and Associates‚Äîto manage, process, and retrieve documents and images efficiently. The system integrates advanced technologies such as Optical Character Recognition (OCR), vector databases for semantic retrieval, and Large Language Models (LLMs) for query resolution. The system supports test-specific workflows.
The solution includes role-based dashboards, secure document management, and advanced query capabilities.

job_title: Full-Stack Developer specializing in AI meeting tools, customizable avatars, notes, and automation.
job_description:
Full-Stack Developer for AI-Powered Meeting Participation with Customizable Avatars, NLP-Based Note-Taking, and Task Automation

Project Overview:
We are seeking a highly skilled Full-Stack Developer to build Drew‚Äôs AI-Powered Meeting Participation System,enhanced with customizable avatars that can be tailored to look and sound like the agent or brokerage representative. Similar to Delphi.ai, this feature will allow users to create personalized avatars that participate in meetings, take notes in real-time, interact with clients, ask dynamic follow-up questions, and generate task workflows and summaries.
This system will integrate with major meeting platforms like Zoom, Delphi Zoom, Google Meet, and others, as well as key CRMs such as kvCORE, Follow Up Boss, Lofty (Chime), and Realty.com. A free demo version will be available for new users, utilizing free lead integrations or sample lead data.
Drew‚Äôs AI Avatar will actively participate in meetings, visually and audibly representing the agent with real-time speech synthesis and body language customization. This feature will support individual agents, teams, and major brokerages like Compass, eXp Realty, Real Brokerage, and others.

Deliverables and Milestones:

Deliverable 1: AI-Powered Meeting Participation with Customizable Avatars
Description: Build Drew‚Äôs ability to attend and participate in meetings using customizable avatars that mirror the agent‚Äôs appearance and voice. The avatar should be able to engage naturally, take cues from conversations, ask follow-up questions, and respond dynamically.
Key Features:
Customizable avatars using facial capture, appearance configuration, and voice synthesis.
Integration with Delphi Zoom or similar APIs for visual participation.
Dynamic body language and gestures to improve engagement.
Speech-to-text and context-based conversation guidance.
Free Version:
Demo avatars with basic customization and limited meeting participation.
Integrations:
Delphi Zoom API ‚Äì Visual avatar integration for meetings.
Zoom API ‚Äì Video participation and data exchange.
Google Meet API ‚Äì Audio participation and transcription.
Eleven Labs API or Resemble AI ‚Äì Custom voice synthesis to match the agent‚Äôs voice.
Otter.ai API ‚Äì Transcriptions for meeting notes.
Free Lead Demo Integration (Realty.com or internal leads) ‚Äì Sample lead data for testing avatar participation.

Deliverable 2: Real-Time Note-Taking, Meeting Summaries, and Action Items
Description: Enable Drew to transcribe meetings, generate real-time notes, and automatically create action items and follow-up tasks. The notes will capture important details like client requirements, deadlines, and key takeaways.
Key Features:
AI-generated real-time notes with task tracking and key points highlighted.
Summarization of discussions into structured meeting summaries.
Dynamic action item generation based on meeting context (e.g., ‚ÄúSchedule a property tour,‚Äù or ‚ÄúSend follow-up email with listing details‚Äù).
Option for agents to manually adjust or enhance notes and summaries.
Free Version:
Real-time notes and basic action items for demo meetings.
Integrations:
Otter.ai API ‚Äì Real-time transcription and note generation.
OpenAI API or Hugging Face NLP ‚Äì Summarization and action item generation.
CRM Integrations (kvCORE, Follow Up Boss, Lofty) ‚Äì Sync notes and tasks directly to CRMs.
Free Lead Demo Integration ‚Äì Provide test meetings with sample leads.

Deliverable 3: Customizable AI-Driven Follow-Up Workflows and Task Automation
Description: Implement an AI-powered workflow system that automatically assigns tasks based on meeting outcomes and lead engagement. Users will be able to create custom workflows tailored to specific client interactions.
Key Features:
AI-recommended follow-up actions and task prioritization.
Custom workflow builder for scheduling follow-ups, property tours, or client consultations.
Dynamic updates to tasks based on lead behavior (e.g., immediate follow-ups for hot leads).
Free Version:
Basic task assignment and follow-up generation for demo meetings.
Integrations:
Google Calendar, Outlook Calendar, Apple Calendar APIs ‚Äì Task scheduling and availability detection.
Trello, Monday.com, Asana APIs ‚Äì Task management and tracking.
CRM Integrations: kvCORE, Follow Up Boss, Realty.com, Lofty.
Free Lead Demo Integration ‚Äì Task workflows using sample data.

Deliverable 4: Multi-Channel Reminders, Rescheduling, and Follow-Up Messaging
Description: Build a multi-channel notification and follow-up system that sends reminders before meetings, suggests rescheduling options, and handles post-meeting communications via email, SMS, or calls.
Key Features:
Automatic reminders 24 hours and 1 hour before meetings.
AI-powered rescheduling suggestions based on availability.
Post-meeting follow-ups via email or SMS with meeting summaries and action items.
Free Version:
Limited reminders and follow-up messaging for demo meetings.
Integrations:
Twilio API ‚Äì SMS and call reminders.
Mailchimp or SMTP API ‚Äì Email confirmations and follow-ups.
Calendar APIs (Google, Outlook, Apple) ‚Äì Scheduling and availability management.
Compliance Module ‚Äì Ensure TCPA compliance for communications.

Deliverable 5: Analytics and Agent Performance Dashboard
Description: Develop a dashboard to provide analytics on meeting participation, follow-up success rates, and agent productivity. The dashboard will track task completion, lead engagement, and meeting outcomes.
Key Features:
Participation metrics, including meeting duration, engagement level, and follow-up task success rates.
Customizable performance reports for team leaders and brokerages.
Predictive analytics to identify opportunities for improved meeting outcomes.
Free Version:
Basic analytics for demo meetings with sample leads.
Integrations:
Follow Up Boss, kvCORE, Realty.com, Lofty ‚Äì Sync performance metrics.
Google Analytics API ‚Äì Track lead engagement and follow-up success rates.

Deliverable 6: Free Meeting Participation Demo with Avatars and Custom Follow-Ups
Description: Provide a free demo experience where users can test AI-powered meeting participation, customizable avatars, and follow-up generation without needing paid accounts.
Key Features:
Free demo avatars for meetings.
Limited real-time notes, task generation, and follow-up workflows.
Integrations:
Realty.com, Lofty, or internal leads ‚Äì Provide sample lead data for demos.

Skills Required:
Full-Stack Development: React, Node.js, Next.js
AI/ML Expertise: Customizable avatars, NLP, and conversation modeling
API Integrations: REST, webhooks, meeting platforms
Speech-to-Text and Voice Synthesis: Otter.ai, Eleven Labs, Resemble AI
Compliance Knowledge: TCPA, GDPR, CCPA

Submission Requirements:
Portfolio: Highlight similar projects in AI, avatars, or meeting participation.
Development Plan: Provide a detailed approach for building AI avatars, meeting integration, and follow-ups.
Demo Capability: Applicants providing demos of avatar-based participation will be prioritized.

Project Summary:
This project will transform meeting participation in real estate, allowing users to leverage AI-powered avatars that look and sound like them, participate in meetings, take notes, and automate follow-ups. By integrating with top CRMs, meeting platforms, and free lead providers, Drew will offer agents and brokerages a comprehensive solution to streamline their workflows and boost productivity.
Apply today to help us redefine the future of real estate meetings!

job_title: Full-Stack Developer for AI-Powered 24/7 Lead Management System with Multi-Channel Communication
job_description:
Full-Stack Developer for AI-Powered Lead Engagement & Communication Platform

Project Overview:
We are developing Drew‚Äôs 24/7 Lead Management System with Multi-Channel Communication, a real-time, AI-driven solution designed to engage leads across SMS, email, phone calls, and in-app notifications. This system enables seamless lead capture, qualification, follow-up, and nurturing‚Äîall without requiring manual intervention from agents.
The platform will offer free/demo usage options with built-in lead integrations for onboarding, alongside support for paid CRM and lead generation services like Zillow, Realtor.com, Lofty (Chime), Compass-supported CRMs, and others. This ensures flexibility for users to experience Drew‚Äôs core capabilities immediately upon sign-up while scaling seamlessly with premium integrations.

Deliverables and Detailed Milestones:

Deliverable 1: Core 24/7 Multi-Channel Lead Management System (Free Demo Access Built-In)
Description: Build a lead management core that enables 24/7 automated lead engagement via SMS, email, in-app messaging, and phone calls. Ensure the system is operational with free/demo leads during onboarding to provide users with immediate value.
Key Features:
Free/demo lead integration from available partners to allow users to experience lead engagement upon sign-up.
Lead capture from multiple channels, including online forms and external lead platforms.
24/7 engagement via SMS, email, calls, and in-app notifications.
Auto-response and dynamic conversation flows based on lead queries and engagement.
Integrations Required:
Free Lead API (TBD): Provide sample or demo leads as part of onboarding.
Realty.com API, Zillow API, Lofty (Chime) API: For premium lead integration.
Twilio API: For SMS, voice, and automated call handling.
SMTP/Email API (e.g., SendGrid): For automated email follow-ups and notifications.
Google Analytics API: For tracking lead engagement on the website.
Outcome: Users will have a fully functional multi-channel lead engagement experience immediately upon onboarding and the ability to connect paid lead sources as needed.

Deliverable 2: AI-Powered Dynamic Conversation Engine
Description: Develop an AI-powered engine that dynamically adapts communication strategies based on lead behavior, urgency, and interaction history.
Key Features:
Dynamic conversation flows based on lead responses and engagement patterns.
Lead qualification through AI-powered natural language processing (NLP).
Sentiment detection to prioritize high-interest leads for immediate follow-up.
Auto-escalation for leads requiring manual intervention.
Integrations Required:
OpenAI API / Custom NLP Models: For analyzing lead queries and generating personalized responses.
CRM Integrations (kvCORE API, Follow Up Boss API, Lofty API): For real-time lead updates and qualification.
Twilio API: For handling phone-based interactions.
Google Cloud Speech-to-Text or AWS Transcribe: For converting voice interactions to text.
Outcome: Agents can rely on AI to qualify leads and generate dynamic responses that adapt to individual interactions, ensuring a seamless lead nurturing experience.

Deliverable 3: Free and Premium Lead Source Integration
Description: Provide dual support for both free/demo leads and premium lead integrations. This enables users to onboard with demo leads while offering scalability for premium services.
Key Features:
Free/demo lead sources available for initial sign-up.
Premium lead source integrations for paid users, supporting major platforms and brokerage-specific CRMs.
Real-time lead data synchronization with CRM systems.
Intelligent lead routing based on geography, priority, and agent availability.
Integrations Required:
Free Lead API (TBD): To provide free/demo lead options during onboarding.
Realty.com API: For additional lead options and data synchronization.
Zillow API, Realtor.com API: Integration for users with premium lead services.
Lofty (Chime), Compass-Supported CRMs (kvCORE, Follow Up Boss, etc.): Full lead integration for premium users.
Outcome: Users experience the flexibility of free lead access while enjoying seamless scaling through premium lead services.

Deliverable 4: Multi-Channel Communication Orchestration with Automation
Description: Automate follow-up tasks and personalized outreach through multiple communication channels, ensuring leads are engaged promptly and consistently.
Key Features:
Automated follow-ups via SMS, email, and calls triggered by lead activity or missed responses.
Customizable workflows for automated engagement and task assignment.
Multi-channel follow-up reminders and appointment confirmations.
Compliance with TCPA and other regulations.
Integrations Required:
Twilio API: For SMS, voice calls, and follow-up notifications.
SMTP/Email APIs: For automated email follow-up sequences.
Google Calendar API: For scheduling follow-ups and appointments.
Compliance Module: Custom-built to handle opt-in and opt-out tracking for leads.
Outcome: Agents can automate their follow-ups and stay compliant, improving efficiency while keeping leads engaged.

Deliverable 5: Centralized Lead Management Dashboard
Description: Create an intuitive, centralized dashboard where agents can view real-time lead statuses, conversation history, and next-best actions.
Key Features:
Visual representation of lead scores, statuses, and communication logs.
Dynamic filtering of leads by priority, behavior, and engagement status.
Suggested next steps based on AI analysis of lead interactions.
Task assignment and performance tracking.
Integrations Required:
Google Analytics API: For tracking and visualizing lead engagement.
Asana API / Trello API: For assigning follow-up tasks and tracking progress.
CRM Integrations: Sync lead data and updates with CRMs like kvCORE, Follow Up Boss, etc.
Outcome: Agents gain a comprehensive view of all active leads and their next-best actions, streamlining daily activities.

Deliverable 6: Post-Engagement Reporting and Insights
Description: Provide detailed analytics and reports on lead engagement, response times, and conversion rates, allowing agents to fine-tune their strategies.
Key Features:
Reports on key metrics, such as response times, engagement rates, and conversions.
Predictive analytics to identify trends and optimize future lead engagement strategies.
Feedback loop to improve AI models for personalized interactions.
Integrations Required:
Google Analytics API: For tracking engagement metrics.
OpenAI API: For predictive analytics and recommendations.
CRM Integrations (kvCORE, Follow Up Boss): For syncing report data and feedback loops.
Outcome: Agents and brokers can review detailed reports, improve decision-making, and continuously optimize their lead engagement processes.

Key Technical Requirements:
Category
Integrations
Lead Data Sources
Free Lead API (TBD), Realty.com API, Zillow API, Lofty API, Realtor.com
CRMs
kvCORE, Follow Up Boss, Lofty (Chime), Compass-supported CRMs
Analytics
Google Analytics API, OpenAI API
Communication
Twilio API (SMS, calls), SMTP/Email APIs (SendGrid)
Calendar and Scheduling
Google Calendar API, Outlook Calendar API, Apple Calendar API
Speech-to-Text
Google Cloud Speech-to-Text, AWS Transcribe
Task Management
Asana API, Trello API
Compliance
Custom compliance module to ensure TCPA, GDPR, and CCPA adherence


Skills Required:
Full-Stack Development: React, Node.js, Next.js
API Integration Expertise: REST, SOAP, webhooks
AI/NLP Experience: OpenAI, TensorFlow, or custom NLP models for conversation flows
CRM Integration: Familiarity with kvCORE, Follow Up Boss, or comparable systems
Real-Time Data Handling: Event-driven architecture to handle lead updates dynamically
Compliance Knowledge: Understanding of TCPA, GDPR, and CCPA

Submission Requirements:
Portfolio: Examples of multi-channel lead management or real-time communication systems.
Development Plan: Provide a brief overview of how you plan to implement free/demo lead integration and multi-channel communication orchestration.
Demo Capability: Preference will be given to candidates who can present a demo of a lead management system with CRM integration and multi-channel functionality.

Project Summary:
This project will transform how agents engage with leads by providing a 24/7 multi-channel communication platform. By integrating free/demo lead access with scalable premium services, Drew ensures that agents can maximize lead engagement and conversions without additional overhead. If you‚Äôre experienced in building real-time communication and AI-powered systems, we‚Äôd love to work with you!

job_title: Data Science & RAG Bot Development Consultant for Marketing Analytics Agency
job_description:
I'll help you create a compelling Upwork job posting that will attract qualified candidates with the right expertise.

# Data Science & RAG Bot Development Consultant for Marketing Analytics Agency

## Project Overview
We're a marketing agency seeking an experienced data scientist/consultant with expertise in Flowise RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) bot development. The ideal candidate will help us structure and optimize our data for both Flowise implementations and machine learning projects.

## Required Skills & Experience
- 3+ years of experience in data science and machine learning
- Proven experience with RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) systems and LLM implementations
- Strong background in Flowise development and customization
- Expertise in data structuring and preprocessing for ML applications
- Experience with marketing analytics and data-driven insights
- Strong Python programming skills
- Experience with vector databases (e.g., Pinecone, Weaviate, or similar)

## Preferred Qualifications
- Experience with n8n workflow automation
- Background in marketing technology and analytics
- Knowledge of popular marketing data sources and APIs
- Experience with data visualization tools
- Familiarity with embedding models (e.g., OpenAI, Cohere, or similar)

## Project Scope
- Audit and optimize our current data structure for RAG applications
- Develop and implement custom RAG bots using Flowise
- Create efficient data pipelines for marketing analytics
- Set up automated workflows for data processing and analysis
- Provide documentation and knowledge transfer
- Train team members on best practices

## Deliverables
1. Data structure optimization plan
2. Custom RAG bot implementation
3. Documentation of workflows and processes
4. Best practices guide for ongoing maintenance

## Project Duration
Possibility for ongoing collaboration based on performance

## Required Information from Candidates
Please include in your proposal:
- Examples of previous RAG bot implementations
- Experience with marketing analytics projects
- Relevant certifications or training
- Your approach to structuring data for ML projects
- Availability and preferred working hours
- Questions about our current setup and needs

## Note
We're looking for a proactive consultant who can not only implement solutions but also provide strategic guidance on best practices for data science in marketing analytics. Strong communication skills and the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical team members are essential.

job_title: Growth Squad Product Analyst
job_description:
About us
Our squad is a data-driven, high-growth team focused on accelerating user acquisition, conversion, and revenue growth through experimentation and optimization. We operate like a startup within the company, leveraging cross-functional expertise to test, iterate, and scale winning strategies for maximum impact.

We work in agile sprints, rapidly testing hypotheses, analyzing results, and refining approaches to drive continuous improvement.

About the role
As a Product Analyst, your goal is to turn data into actionable insights that drive product and business growth. You‚Äôll analyze user behavior, marketing channels, and experiment performance, track key performance metrics, and provide recommendations to enhance customer engagement, retention, and revenue growth.

This role involves designing and analyzing experiments (A/B testing, feature rollouts), detecting trends and anomalies, and optimizing marketing and product performance. Your insights will directly shape product strategy and influence high-impact business decisions.

Key Responsibilities
Track and report on key growth metrics (activation, retention, conversion, revenue, engagement).
Design, run, and analyze A/B tests to measure product and UX improvements.
Monitor data trends and flag anomalies (e.g., conversion drops, tracking errors, unusual user behavior).
Ensure accurate data tracking across product and marketing, working with teams to improve event tracking.
Build and maintain dashboards to visualize experiment results and product performance.
Conduct deep-dive analysis (funnels, cohorts, churn, segmentation) to identify growth opportunities.
Use predictive analytics to forecast trends, identify high-value users, and improve personalization.
Analyze marketing channels (social media, email, paid ads, referrals) to optimize acquisition strategies.
Gather insights from multiple data sources (Google Analytics, Amplitude, KPIs, surveys, heatmaps).
Present findings to stakeholders (Product, Growth, Engineering, Marketing) to drive decisions.
Automate reporting processes for efficient and scalable data insights.
Ensure data accuracy and proactively resolve tracking issues.

Tech Stack You‚Äôll Work With
SQL, Python ‚Äì For data extraction, analysis, and modeling.
Tableau, Looker, Power BI ‚Äì For data visualization and reporting.
Google Analytics ‚Äì For user behavior and event tracking.
Dremio ‚Äì For data querying and processing.
A/B Testing Tool ‚Äì Convert
Marketing & Attribution Tools ‚Äì Google Ads, Meta Ads, Klaviyo.

job_title: AI Model Development & Training for Brand-Compliant Image Generation
job_description:
I am looking for an experienced AI & Machine Learning expert to develop and implement a custom AI model that generates brand-compliant visuals based on specific design guidelines.

Important: This is not about using existing stock image generation tools. We need a custom-trained AI model that can produce images aligned with predefined brand identities.

Requirements & Challenges

1. Development of a Proprietary AI Solution
	‚Ä¢	Build a trainable AI model that can be fine-tuned for specific brand guidelines (colors, composition, and style).
	‚Ä¢	Ensure scalability, so additional brands can be added in the future.

2. Technical Requirements
	‚Ä¢	Custom Model Training: Fine-tuning existing generative models (e.g., Stable Diffusion, StyleGAN) to fit brand-specific visual styles.
	‚Ä¢	API Integration: The solution should be compatible with internal workflows or external platforms.
	‚Ä¢	Data Processing: Training the model on brand-compliant datasets (considering legal aspects).

3. Long-Term Vision
	‚Ä¢	The AI model should serve as a scalable platform for generating brand-consistent visual assets.
	‚Ä¢	Potential expansion to other media formats (e.g., video, 3D assets).

4. Training & Knowledge Transfer
	‚Ä¢	Enable an in-house designer to use and optimize the AI model independently.
	‚Ä¢	Provide documentation & onboarding for future improvements and scalability.

Required Expertise

I am looking for an AI/ML developer with experience in:
‚úÖ Fine-tuning and training generative AI models (e.g., Stable Diffusion, StyleGAN, DALL¬∑E).
‚úÖ Machine Learning & Deep Learning for image generation.
‚úÖ Implementing custom AI workflows for business applications.
‚úÖ Developing API integrations for seamless deployment.
‚úÖ Scaling and optimizing AI models for specific branding needs.

What I Expect
	‚Ä¢	Technical Implementation: Develop & train a custom AI model that generates brand-compliant images.
	‚Ä¢	Scalable Architecture: The solution should be expandable to support multiple brands.
	‚Ä¢	Onboarding & Support: Assist with internal adoption & usage.

üìå Freelancers only ‚Äì no agencies!

I look forward to receiving applications with relevant references & an estimation of effort and feasibility! üöÄ

job_title: AI Agent Development for Lead Generation Agency
job_description: We are seeking a skilled developer to create a custom AI Agent tailored for our lead generation agency. The ideal candidate will have experience in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and automation to enhance our lead generation processes. The AI Agent should efficiently identify and engage potential leads, streamline workflows, and integrate with existing systems. Your ability to analyze data and adapt the AI's performance will be crucial in achieving our business goals. If you're passionate about AI and have a proven track record in similar projects, we want to hear from you!

job_title: AI CCTV System for Theft Detection
job_description: We are seeking an experienced AI developer to create a theft detection system for our CCTV cameras. Similar to https://veesion.io/. The project involves developing algorithms that can accurately identify suspicious activities and send real-time alerts. You should be familiar with machine learning techniques, image processing, and video analytics. The goal is to enhance our security measures by implementing a reliable AI-driven solution. If you have a passion for AI and security technology, we would love to hear from you!

job_title: Senior AI/web Engineer for Generative AI and LLM Based Chatbot development
job_description:
We are in the process of creating a chatbot application tailored for an e-commerce website.

As part of this project, we are transitioning our chatbot from an open source LLM solution, but have encountered some technical challenges during the migration.

We are seeking a highly experienced Senior AI/web engineer with over 8 years of hands on experience in AI, ML, GenAI solutions. Expertise in working with LLM is essential.

Bonus skill: full stack web development experience is highly valued and would be an asset for this role.

If you meet the qualifications and have relevant examples of past projcts, we'd love to hear from you!

Please share your experience and any similar work you've done in this space.

If you are not bot, please attach your github link and start your proposal with the "I am super expert"

job_title: AI Workflow Automation Specialist Needed
job_description:
We are seeking a skilled automation specialist to streamline our existing setup of multiple AI bots and prompts. Your role will involve connecting these systems to create a smooth and efficient workflow. The ideal candidate will have experience in automation tools and a strong understanding of AI integration. If you're passionate about enhancing productivity through automation, we want to hear from you! Please include examples of previous automation projects in your application.

The scope surrounds connecting 2 Open AI bots and 6 chatgpt prompts with notion and typeform.

The end goal is that we save a lot of time that we use now for copy and pasting.

Thanks!

job_title: Web App Development for Summarizing Indian Companies' Annual Reports
job_description: We are seeking a talented developer to create a web application that summarizes the Management Discussion and Analysis (MD&A) sections of annual reports from Indian listed companies. The app should extract relevant data from PDF documents and present it in a user-friendly format by company and year. The ideal candidate will have experience with PDF parsing, web development frameworks, and data visualization. If you have a passion for financial data and web technologies, we would love to hear from you!

job_title: Chatbot Expert
job_description:
We are a SaaS company seeking a highly skilled and experienced consultant to guide us in implementing a Chatbot solution powered by Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) for production use. Our goal is to develop a Chatbot that allows clients to ask questions in natural language and receive accurate, context-aware responses based on their proprietary data.

Key Requirements:
- Multi-Tenancy & Customer Isolation: The solution must support multi-tenancy, ensuring complete data isolation between different clients.
- Multi-Agent Architecture: The system should integrate multiple agents, with the primary agent serving as the source of truth (e.g., databases, vector stores) and secondary agents pulling data from additional sources such as APIs.
- Scalability & Production Readiness: The architecture must be robust, scalable, and optimized for real-world production environments.

What We‚Äôre Looking For:
- An expert with deep knowledge of Chatbot development, RAG frameworks, and natural language processing (NLP).
- Proven experience in designing and implementing multi-tenant, multi-agent systems.
- Familiarity with both SaaS and open-premise solutions, as we are open to either approach.
- Strong understanding of data security, scalability, and performance optimization for production-grade systems.

job_title: AI Developer Needed for OpenAI Chatbot Customization Training
job_description: I am looking for an experienced AI developer who can provide hands-on training in the backend of OpenAI. The ideal candidate will guide me through the process of customizing a chatbot, offering insights into best practices and advanced techniques. Your expertise will help me understand the intricacies of AI development and ensure I can effectively implement the knowledge gained. If you have a strong background in AI and teaching, I would love to hear from you!
